overview:
this account is for me and my fiance who are thinking of having children but have some medical and mental problems

I have diabetes, endrometriosis, possible breast cancer and uterine cancer (runs in the family)

I also have Bipolar, PTSD (flash backs from sexual abuse), Clinical Depress, and MPD … split personalities

He has Bipolar and social anxiety, knee problems and some other Manic Depression related things

We needed advice on how to go about having and raising our children
